required_fields: Please fill all the required fields
DECLINED: Transaction declined by the bank, Please use an alternate credit card
INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS: There is no enough amount on the card to complete the transaction

Value 'xxxx' is invalid. value: xxxx - r: The security number (CVC/CVV) was entered incorrectly by the cardholder
EXPIRED CARD: The transaction failed as the card appears to have expired.
REFERRED: The bank has indicated there is a problem with the credit card number.
Allowed time frame for transaction has b: The payment process took too long (more than 15 minutes), Please try again
